name: Europa Universalis III: Napoleon's Ambition
description:
Europa Universalis III: Napoleon's Ambition is a strategy game developed by Paradox Interactive. It came out on 22-08-2007. Paradox Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Europa Universalis III: Napoleon's Ambition on PC.
Johan Andersson produced the game. Andreas Waldetoft scored the game.
